entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:18 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.0°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 100.9 kPa

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
